mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into h_store (`name`, pinyin, city, address, phone, `desc`, sort, creater_id, modifier_id, create_time, modify_time, `status`, store_color) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update h_store set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_color = #{storeColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, pinyin, city, address, phone, `desc`, sort, creater_id, modifier_id, create_time, modify_time, `status`, store_color from h_store where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
